indicator_name: 빈민가, 임시거처 또는 비적정 거처에 거주하는 도시 인구 비율
target_name: 2030년까지 모두에게 충분하고 안전 및 저렴한 주택 및 기본서비스 제공 그리고 빈민가 개선

en.target_name: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums
en.computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
en.indicator_name: Proportion of urban population living in slums, informal settlements or inadequate housing
en.global_indicator_name: Proportion of urban population living in slums, informal settlements or inadequate housing
en.data_name: Proportion of households under Minimum Housing Standard
en.indicator_definition: The proportion of households that do not meet the minimum residental area for their household composition and the minimum number of habitable rooms
en.graph_title: Proportion of households under Minimum Housing Standard
en.source_organisation_1: Housing Policy Division, Housing Policy Bureau, Ministry of Land, Infrastructure and Transport
